<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION GODIRECT
CONNECTIVITY
CONFERENCE
RIYADH Dear customers and partners, We would like to remind you that the GoDirect Connectivity Conference <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]> takes place on April 30 in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia!
We had a great conference in Jeddah last month, so if you have missed it, please take this opportunity to meet the Middle East Honeywell GoDirect team. You will be able to join the dialog about latest technologies and the future of the Connected Aircraft.
REGISTER FOR FREE NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]>
Venue: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel, Northern Ring Rd, Al Wadi Ar Riyadh, Riyadh, 11552, Saudi Arabia
Time: 8:30 – 14:00 on April 30, 2018
Agenda: Detailed agenda is available online <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]>
WHY YOU SHOULD ATTEND
Learn about Connectivity Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s Connectivity solutions covering all hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STC's, and mandates.
Find out About HAPP's Advantages
Now you can protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP).
Get the Latest on Cyber Security
Honeywell GoDirect Cyber Protection solution will help you protect your aircraft against cyber threats.
View complete agenda <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]>
Looking forward to meeting you in Riyadh!
Tim Jensen Connectivity Sales Manager Middle East Tim.Jensen@Honeywell.com
